name: Mayotte
introduction: Mayotte is an archipelago in the Indian Ocean between Madagascar and the coast of Mozambique. It’s a department and region of France though traditional Mayotte culture is most closely related to that of the neighboring Comoros islands. The Mayotte archipelago is surrounded by a coral barrier reef which shelters a lagoon and marine reserve that are popular diving destinations.
overview: Mayotte is an archipelago in the Indian Ocean between Madagascar and the coast of Mozambique. languages.name: Makonde
languages.area: Mtwara region, primarily Mtwara Urban, Mtwara Rural, Tandahomba, and Newala districts. Also in Mozambique.

languages.name: Makhuwa-Meetto
languages.area: Cabo Delgado and Niassa provinces. Also in Tanzania.

languages.name: Plateau Malagasy
languages.area: Central. Also in Comoros, Réunion, United States.

languages.name: Swahili (Coastal)
languages.area: Zanzibar, coastal areas. Also in Burundi, Canada, Kenya, Libya, Mayotte, Mozambique, Oman, Rwanda, Somalia, South Africa, Uganda, United Arab Emirates, United States.
